title: Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI
text:
Chris Perez Watched 'Selena' And Live Blogged His Reactions! posted by Qui West - share 
On Tuesday night, the late singer's widower decided to watch the film on Lifetime for the first time since it's premiere. Qui West began his radio journey in 2006 as an intern in San Francisco where he developed a love for radio. From there, he became a public affairs host and landed a weekend on air spot with KYLD Wild 949. The he hit the majors and worked at Houston's legendary hip hop station KBXX 979 The Box. Qui West hosted the No.1 rated night show in the market for almost 4 years. Most recently, he was home in San Francisco at KRBQ 102. Now he has a new home, right here in the I.E. on 99.1 KGGI. Join him every afternoon from 2-6p and follow him everywhere @QuiWest. Contact
